Definition: Each of the five sentences in the story are numbered 1 through 5. Write the title for the story that was related to those sentences with a maximum of three words.

Sentence 4: They tried everything, but the buttons didn't do anything. Sentence 5: THey had to get up and walk across the room to change the channel!

Negative Examples.input: Sentence 1: Today I had lunch alone. Sentence 2: I tried to sit with people, but they left me. Sentence 3: I was so sad. Sentence 4: When I walked home from school I cried. Sentence 5: Someone came up to me on the road and told me to not worry.
